bibl.title: A new papyrus programme for the Theadelpheia: Ptolemaic festival culture and dynastic ideology
bibl.seg: Elena Chepel, A New Papyrus Programme for the Theadelpheia: Ptolemaic Festival Culture and Dynastic Ideology.

Russian-Egyptian expedition in tne necropolis of Deir el-Banat (south-east of the Fayum oasis), late 243 or early 242 BC. - Introduction. - Archaeological context, physical description, and palaeography. - Text and translation. - Commentary. - Discussion: 1. Date and chronology; - 2. The games: status, content, and participants.
bibl.note: Russian-Egyptian expedition in tne necropolis of Deir el-Banat (south-east of the Fayum oasis), late 243 or early 242 BC. - Introduction. - Archaeological context, physical description, and palaeography. - Text and translation. - Commentary. - Discussion: 1. Date and chronology; - 2. The games: status, content, and participants.
